001package com.technototes.library.hardware;
002
003import java.util.Arrays;
004import java.util.List;
005
006/**
007 * Interface for hardware device groups
008 * <p>
009 * This is useful, but needs to be re-implemented separate from the HardwareDevice wrapper system
010 *
011 * @author Alex Stedman
012 */
013@Deprecated
014@SuppressWarnings("unused")
015public interface HardwareDeviceGroup<T extends HardwareDevice> {
016    /**
017     * Get the followers for the lead device
018     *
019     * @return The followers
020     */
021    T[] getFollowers();
022
023    default List<T> getFollowerist() {
024        return Arrays.asList(getFollowers());
025    }
026
027    /**
028     * Get all devices in group
029     *
030     * @return All devices
031     */
032    T[] getAllDevices();
033
034    default List<T> getAllDeviceList() {
035        return Arrays.asList(getAllDevices());
036    }
037
038    /**
039     * Propogate actions across the followers
040     * <p>
041     * Note to self: Alex couldn't spell :)
042     *
043     * @param value the value to propogate
044     */
045    @Deprecated
046    default void propogate(double value) {}
047
048    /**
049     * Propagate actions across the followers
050     * <p>
051     * Note to self: Alex couldn't spell :)
052     *
053     * @param value the value to propagate
054     */
055    default void propagate(double value) {}
056}
